Class ObjectEngineForwarder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe.ObjectEngineForwarder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectEngine

    public abstract class ObjectEngineForwarder
extends Object
implements ObjectEngine
    A simple forwarder for the ObjectEngine interface.

      • createTask

        public Task createTask(String applicationName,
                       boolean persistent)
                throws UnknownApplicationException
        Description copied from interface: ObjectEngine
        Creates a Zeidon task. If persistent = true then the Object Engine will keep a persistent reference to the task. This means that task.dropTask() *must* be called for it to be released. A non-persistent task will be automatically cleaned up once there are no more application references to the task.
        Specified by:
        createTask in interface ObjectEngine
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnknownApplicationException

      • getSystemTask

        public Task getSystemTask()
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the Zeidon System task that is registered when the Object Engine is instantiated.

      • getTaskList

        public List<? extends Task> getTaskList()
        Description copied from interface: ObjectEngine
        Return the list of current tasks sorted by task ID. Note that holding on to this list could prevent non-persistent tasks from being garbage-collected.
        Specified by:
        getTaskList in interface ObjectEngine
        Returns:
        list of current tasks.
